kpi.name: m3072c0015

kpi_info.title: NUMBER OF PACKETS DROPPED DUE TO MAXIMUM SESSION FLOW LIMIT REACHED
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of packets dropped per session profile when the maximum flow limit per PDN connection is reached. The maximum number of flows a PDN connection can maintain is set through the session-max-flows parameter in the session profile configuration. UPDATED: Updated each time a packet is dropped due to the maximum flow limit per PDN connection being reached.

kpi.kpi_alias: NUMBER OF PACKETS DROPPED DUE TO MAXIMUM SESSION FLOW LIMIT REACHED
